00021 using namespace std;

00023 static Lexicon l;

00025 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00026 {
00027         if (argc < 3)
00028         {
00029                 cerr << "ERROR: not enough parameters" << endl << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " translation reference" << endl;
00030                 return 0; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00031         }
00032 
00033         // open files
00034         ifstream trans(argv[1]);
00035         ifstream ref(argv[2]);
00036         if (!trans.good())
00037         {
00038                 cerr << "ERROR: Opening translation ("<< argv[1] <<") failed." << endl;
00039                 return 1; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00040         }
00041         if (!ref.good())
00042         {
00043                 cerr << "ERROR: Opening reference ("<< argv[2] <<") failed." << endl;
00044                 return 1; // EXIT_FAILURE;
00045         }
00046 
00047         string  trans_line,
00048                 ref_line                                = "";
00049         double  average_levenshtein_dist,
00050                 average_posindependent_levenshtein_dist = 0;
00051 
00052         // read trans and ref and calculate the ratings
00053         unsigned int    sentenceCount           = 0;
00054         Levenshtein*    sentence50_lev          = NULL;
00055         string          sentence50_trans,
00056                         sentence50_ref          = "";
00057 
00058         while (getline(trans, trans_line) && getline(ref, ref_line))
00059         {
00060                 vector<unsigned int> current_trans = l.insertSentence(trans_line);
00061                 vector<unsigned int> current_ref   = l.insertSentence(ref_line);
00062 
00063                 Bleu        *current_bleu = new Bleu       (current_trans, current_ref);
00064                 Levenshtein *current_lev  = new Levenshtein(current_trans, current_ref);
00065 
00066                 // sort line to calculate the pos-independent Levinshtein-Distance
00067                         vector<string> trans_line_vec = stringSplit(trans_line, " ");
00068                         vector<string> ref_line_vec   = stringSplit(ref_line  , " ");
00069 
00070                         sort( trans_line_vec.begin(), trans_line_vec.end() );
00071                         sort( ref_line_vec.begin()  , ref_line_vec.end()   );
00072 
00073                         vector<unsigned int> current_trans_sorted = l.insertSentence(trans_line_vec);
00074                         vector<unsigned int> current_ref_sorted   = l.insertSentence(ref_line_vec);
00075 
00076                 Levenshtein *current_posindependent_lev = new Levenshtein(current_trans_sorted, current_ref_sorted);
00077 
00078                 // sums for avg distances
00079                 average_levenshtein_dist                += current_lev->getDistance();
00080                 average_posindependent_levenshtein_dist += current_posindependent_lev->getDistance();
00081 
00082                 // output
00083                 cout    << "\n***\nBLEU-Score:\t\t"     << current_bleu->bleuScore(MAX_N_GRAMS)
00084                         << "\nLevenshtein:\t\t"         << current_lev->getDistance()
00085                         << "\npos-ind. Levenshtein:\t"  << current_posindependent_lev->getDistance()
00086                         << "\n\t t: " << trans_line
00087                         << "\n\t r: " << ref_line
00088                         << endl;
00089 
00090                 sentenceCount++;
00091 
00092                 if (sentenceCount==50)
00093                 {
00094                         sentence50_lev   = current_lev;
00095                         sentence50_trans = trans_line;
00096                         sentence50_ref   = ref_line;
00097                 }
00098         }
00099 
00100         cout    << "\n***\n\n***\nSentence50:\nLevenshtein:\t\t" << sentence50_lev->getDistance()
00101                 << "\nLevenshtein-Path:\t" << sentence50_lev->getPath()
00102                 << "\n\t t: " << sentence50_trans
00103                 << "\n\t r: " << sentence50_ref
00104                 << endl;
00105 
00106         average_levenshtein_dist                /= (double)sentenceCount;
00107         average_posindependent_levenshtein_dist /= (double)sentenceCount;
00108 
00109         // print the avarages
00110         cout    << "\n***\n\n***\naverage levenshtein distance: "     << average_levenshtein_dist
00111                 << "\naverage pos.independent levenshtein distance: " << average_posindependent_levenshtein_dist
00112                 << endl;
00113 
00114         return 0; //EXIT_SUCCESS;
00115 }
